title.rendered: Tastebudz Feminized Seed Mix Pack | 4 Strains | 12 Seeds |

content.rendered:
🎁 Best Feminized Seed Mix Pack – 12 Seeds, 4 Strains, Endless Possibility

Premium Variety, Top Genetics – All in One Feminized Seed Mix Pack

The Feminized Seed Mix Pack from Tastebudz Syndicate is a premium 12-seed collection featuring four top-rated cannabis strains. Whether you’re an experienced collector or just starting out, this feminized seed pack delivers standout flavour, THC-rich genetics, and unbeatable variety in one convenient bundle.

Each pack includes 12 seeds total – 3 each of 4 top-selling photoperiod feminized seeds – selected for their potency, performance, and unique flavour profiles.

🌿 What’s Inside the Tastebudz Feminized Seed Mix Pack?

You’ll receive four premium photoperiod feminized cannabis strains:

🕰️ Back to the Future

This powerhouse strain combines Gorilla Glue #4 and Alien Tahoe OG to produce resin-loaded buds, 30% THC, and knockout effects.

🌙 Moonberry

An 80% Indica cross of Blue Moonrock and Blackberry Kush with rich fruity flavour and over 30% THC. Formerly known as Blackberry Moonrocks.

🍪 Peanut Butter Cookies

Nutty, creamy and potent — a 25% THC hybrid that’s fast-flowering, flavourful, and beginner-friendly.

🧁 MAC Muffin

Full Indica strength meets blueberry muffin flavour in this 22% THC treat. Ideal for relaxing evenings and dessert lovers alike.

👉 Explore our full photoperiod feminized seeds collection to discover more top-tier strains.

🌟 Why Choose the Feminized Seed Mix Pack?

🎯 Save time choosing — enjoy four proven winners in one pack
🔄 Ideal for sampling multiple flavour profiles without multiple purchases
🧠 Designed to suit both relaxing and uplifting preferences in one bundle
🛍️ Great for gift-givers who want premium seeds with universal appeal
🔬 Built for collectors seeking consistency across a variety of effects
🧩 Perfect for those who want to test and compare strains side-by-side
🪙 More affordable than buying each strain separately

❓ FAQ – Feminized Seed Mix Pack

1. How many seeds are in the Tastebudz Feminized Seed Mix Pack?
12 seeds total – 3 seeds each of 4 premium feminized strains.

2. Are all seeds feminized?
Yes. Every seed in this pack is 100% feminized and photoperiod, bred for reliability and consistency.

3. Can I buy the included strains individually?
Yes! Each of the four strains in this bundle is also available individually on our website.

4. Is this pack beginner-friendly?
Absolutely. These strains were chosen for performance and ease of care, making them great for novice collectors.

5. What are the benefits of a cannabis seed mix pack?
A mix pack provides great value and variety, allowing you to explore different genetics without committing to one strain.

6. Can I gift this cannabis seed mix pack?
Yes – it’s a great option for gift-givers who want to share premium genetics but aren’t sure what someone prefers.

7. What kind of collector is this seed pack ideal for?
This mix is perfect for collectors who want flavour diversity, consistent feminized genetics, and high THC content in one affordable bundle.

8. Do the included strains have similar flowering times?
Most range between 8–10 weeks, offering a balanced mix of fast and standard cycles. See each linked strain page for full details.

9. What’s the best way to start a cannabis seed collection?
A great way to begin your cannabis seed collection is with a curated mix pack like this one. It offers variety, trusted genetics, and value in one convenient bundle — ideal for discovering your preferences or building a diverse seed vault.

🔗 Also Available From Our Official Retailers

Looking for the Feminized Seed Mix Pack from a trusted source near you? This mix is also available through our network of verified retailers.

🛒 Shop with confidence: View Our Full Retailers List → 🌍 (Including USA)

💡 We only partner with licensed, reputable sellers. For guaranteed authenticity, always purchase directly from Tastebudz Syndicate or our official retailers.

📜 Legal Note

All cannabis seeds are sold strictly as adult souvenirs. Germination or cultivation of cannabis seeds is illegal in the UK without a government-issued licence. Always check local laws before purchasing.
